price: Sababa isaan waadaa isaanii diiguutiin, keeyyattoota Rabbiitti kafaruutiin, nabiyyoota haqaan ala ajjeesuu isaaniitiifi “onneen keenya haguugamtee jirti” jechuu isaaniitiin (isaan abaarre). Dhugumatti Rabbiin sababaa kufrii isaaniitiif ishee (onnee isaanii) irratti haguuge; muraasa malee hin amananu.
arabic: فَبِمَا نَقۡضِهِم مِّيثَٰقَهُمۡ وَكُفۡرِهِم بِـَٔايَٰتِ ٱللَّهِ وَقَتۡلِهِمُ ٱلۡأَنۢبِيَآءَ بِغَيۡرِ حَقّٖ وَقَوۡلِهِمۡ قُلُوبُنَا غُلۡفُۢۚ بَلۡ طَبَعَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهَا بِكُفۡرِهِمۡ فَلَا يُؤۡمِنُونَ إِلَّا قَلِيلٗا

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: fabimā naqḍihim mīthāqahum wakuf'rihim biāyāti al-lahi waqatlihimu al-anbiyāa bighayri ḥaqqin waqawlihim qulūbunā ghul'fun bal ṭabaʿa al-lahu ʿalayhā bikuf'rihim falā yu'minūna illā qalīlan
